description:
You lost your heart to your one-and-only love. Now your sweetheart is always with you - just one click and you are connected! Just tap on the heart to call her or him or send an SMS. You loose your heart only once – there is no better way to show his or her importance to you.

The „Darling“ Icon is a heart with a real pulse and is a symbol for your heartbeat when calling your sweetheart….

The Darling App is extremely easy to use:
At your first start of our „Darling“ app it will ask you to enter the phone number of your sweetheart and to define if you want to create an instant call or send an sms or if you want to choose every time when opening the app. If you need to change the number or settings just tap “settings” and redefine them.
